channel.title: Help getting server started
channel.description:
Hey sorry to post this but i need help and none of the other post helped me really,so if you can help me please do.
Jun 20, 2010 10:12:17 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:17 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:17 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jun 20, 2010 10:12:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager INFO: Loading scripts... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:18 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jun 20, 2010 10:12:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Jun 20, 2010 10:12:21 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheExceptio n: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Jun 20, 2010 10:12:21 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Press any key to continue . . .[/

item.title: Help getting server started
item.dc:creator: @head_hunt20 head hunt20
item.description:
